    public static final class Slug.Builder
extends Object
    Builder to configure and create the slugger.

    1.0.0

        public Slug.Builder lang(Language lang)
        Language for symbol translation.

        Language.NONE for don't convert symbols.

        Parameters:

        self validated object for method chaining

      • maintainCase

        public Slug.Builder maintainCase(boolean maintainCase)
        How to deal with case of characters.
        Parameters:
        maintainCase - if true maintain case, if false convert all chars to lower case
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • titleCase

        public Slug.Builder titleCase(boolean titleCase)
        Whether to convert input string to title-case.
        Parameters:
        titleCase - true to convert, else false
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • titleCaseExclude

        public Slug.Builder titleCaseExclude(String... titleCaseExclude)
        Words to exclude from title case.

        This option has only effect if titleCase is set true.

        Parameters:
        titleCaseExclude - list of words to exclude, must not be null
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • titleCaseExclude

        Words to exclude from title case.

        This option has only effect if titleCase is set true.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • truncate

        public Slug.Builder truncate(int truncate)
        Max length to truncate without breaking words.

        0 does not truncate.

        Parameters:
        truncate - must not be negative
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • uric

        public Slug.Builder uric(boolean uric)
        Whether to allow additional characters.

        If true special characters will not be replaced.

        Parameters:
        uric - if true they will not be converted
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • uricNoSlash

        public Slug.Builder uricNoSlash(boolean uricNoSlash)
        Whether to allow additional characters.

        If true special characters will not be replaced.

        Parameters:
        uricNoSlash - if true they will not be converted
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • mark

        public Slug.Builder mark(boolean mark)
        Whether to allow additional characters.

        If true special characters will not be replaced.

        Parameters:
        mark - if true they will not be converted
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining

      • custom

        public Slug.Builder custom(Map<String,String> custom)
        Custom map for translation.

        This overwrites all!

        Example: 

         final Slug.Builder builder = Slug.Builder.newBuilder();
 ...
 final Map<String, String> custom = new HashMap<>();
 custom.put("&", "#");
 custom.put("*", "star");
 ...
 builder.custom(custom);
        Parameters:
        custom - must not be null
        Returns:
        self validated object for method chaining
